霙字的基本解释

霙
yīng
雪花：“晚雨纤纤变玉霙。”
花瓣：“飞霙弄晚，荡千里暗香平远。”

霙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīng］
［《廣韻》於驚切，平庚，影。］
(1)雪花。
(2)霰，雪珠。

霙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霙； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1376第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】於驚切【正韻】於京切，?音英。【玉篇】雨雪雜下。【集韻】霰也。【埤雅】雪寒甚則爲粒，淺則成華，華謂之霙。【韓詩外傳】雪華曰霙。【集韻】通作英。　又【廣韻】【正韻】?於良切，音央。【廣韻】霙霙，白雪貌。

霙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
霙字的起名意思

雪花；雪珠。

sleet
Basic explanation of words
sleet
yīng
Snowflake: "The late rain becomes slender and jade."
Petals: "Flying to make night, swinging thousands of miles and fragrant peacefully."

["Guangyun" Yu Jingqie, Ping Geng, Ying. ]

(2) Hao, Xuezhu.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　霙; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1376 Page 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Yu Jingqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Jingqie,? Yinying. [Jade articles] Mixed rain and snow. 【Ji Yun】Hai Ye. [Piya] The snow is very cold, the grain is very small, the shallow is the flower, and the flower is the great. [Han Shiwai Biography] Xuehua said: 【Ji Yun】Tong Zuoying.　[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Liangqie, Yin Yang. [Guangyun] Kuai, snowy appearance.
